channel.title: Looking for php pros!
channel.description:
Rs2 Network needs your help! Kindaof. I need someone really good with PHP. I am Owner of Reaper Ltd. and now the second owner of Rs2 Network and what we need is good php expert...
Basically our server is so good, I mean real good, that its like runescape jnr. We need to update a little more to make it almost a runescape copy. With a php coder we can make a working webpage, similar to runescape, and I can help with the HTML because I'm a pro with HTML. I made lots of pages but in html and it doesnt work like runescape without php. With it we can make a database with it. Also load from the server character profile.
Man I don't even know what I'm talking about, all I know I need someone that knows more than me. OK? I'm open and will hire the best. I'm trying to surprise the other owner and staff member in Rs2 Network with a good coder. Yeah that all. and you will get admin status, maybe I can give u Co-Co-Owner status. =]
up to u!

item.title: Looking for php pros!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

[quote=“Monkey wacko, post:14, topic:128966”]TALK TO THE OWNER OF THIS SITE WE KNOW EACH OTHER HES AWESOME AT PHP!!!

http://www.zetageneration.com/

PS: he has forums exactly like runescape’s!!![/quote]
thats kool, I saw it, except he needs to work on it a bit more. I can do the HTML and he the php, combine forces, and make an awsome website, but change the grafix a bit too! gets boring looking runescape always… =]

Read full topic
